```{r}
library(plyr)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(caret)
library(VGAM)
library(factoextra)
```

#učitavanje i sređivanje podataka
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
data = read.csv("data_arrhythmia.csv", sep= ";")
data[data == "?"] = "0"
data = data %>% mutate_if(is.character,as.integer)
library(janitor)
data = remove_constant(data)
```


```{r}
model = glm (diagnosis~., data=data)
summary(model)
step(model, k=2)
```
